titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4299) to extend the Terrorism Insurance Program of the Department of the Treasury, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-490, by Mr. Arcuri.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 169.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4299 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 862.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 189 (Roll no. 1145).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/12/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 4299 (Terrorism Risk Insurance Program Reauthorization Act of 2007).
